Class DashboardExtractService.SourceZipExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.composum.sling.dashboard.service.DashboardExtractService.SourceZipExtractor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResourceExtractService.Extractor, Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Enclosing class:
    DashboardExtractService
    public class DashboardExtractService.SourceZipExtractor
extends Object
implements ResourceExtractService.Extractor
    the extractor to generate a ZIP file containing the source resources as XML sourcecode files mapped to the target paths of the source resources

      • extract

        protected void extract​(@Nullable
                       @Nullable org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource source,
                       @NotNull
                       @NotNull String targetPath,
                       boolean writeParents)
                throws IOException
        extract a source resource any maybe its parents and configured child elements
        Parameters:
        source - the source resource to extract
        targetPath - the target path to extract to (the path of the zip entry)
        writeParents - specifies whether the content of the parents should be written or not
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs

      • extractResource

        public void extractResource​(@NotNull
                            @NotNull org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource source,
                            @NotNull
                            @NotNull String targetPath,
                            boolean writeContent)
                     throws IOException
        extract on single resource as XML source file added to the ZIP stream if not already added
        Parameters:
        source - the source resource to extract
        targetPath - the target path to extract to (the path of the zip entry)
        writeContent - if 'true' an XML content file is created and added to the ZIP stream
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs

      • writeXmlToZip

        protected void writeXmlToZip​(@NotNull
                             @NotNull org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource resource,
                             @Nullable
                             @Nullable Integer maxDepth)
        writes the content as XML source using the general XmlRenderer service of the dashboard
        Parameters:
        resource - the resource to write as XML source file
        maxDepth - the max depth of the rendered content; 'null' = infinite
